Long Forgotten Earth

v0.14

Description

Long Forgotten Earth (aka LFE) is a 3D role playing game in a first person view.
The game is base on Space exploration, on a large spaceship, in a realistic univers, with numerous planets, NPC and quests.

Classes

LFE is known to compile under Windows XP using Microsoft Visual C++ 6.0. The game use the following 3rd-party libraries: TinyXML, libnoise, StarGen-II.

Contact

The game website is here

Source code is available at GitHub and maintained by Sphinkie
